p: Similarly, Ivermectin is an anthelmintic drug that acts on parasites and roundworm infections. This drug was shown to be a promising candidate for treating viral diseases, including chikungunya and yellow fever [ 25]. Several clinical trials are underway after Ivermectin was proven to have in vitro activity against SARS-CoV-2. Ivermectin led to significant reduction in viral RNA shortly after treatment [ 26]. However, the concentrations needed to achieve these promising in vitro results were much higher than those recommended and approved for the treatment of parasitic infections. Thereby, the FDA issued a warning against the inappropriate use of Ivermectin for the treatment of COVID-19 patients [ 27].
